com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.gviz
Class ErrorHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.visualization.client.events.Handler
      com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.gviz.ErrorHandler

public abstract class ErrorHandler
extends com.google.gwt.visualization.client.events.Handler

A handler for error events raised by GVizRhizosphere. Error events are fired whenever GVizRhizosphere fails drawing due to problems in the input datatable.

See the error event documentation for further info.

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)
